items.value: Merge Tool
Click two rooms of the same kind to merge them together and remove the walls between them.
Delete Tool
Click anything, anything at all to delete it!
Hallway
The building block of any level! There can only be one room of this type in a level!
Classroom
The intended location to place notebooks.
Faculty
Place rare items in here!
Office
The Principal will teleport you to one of these if you get sent to detention.
Closet
No special properties. Gotta Sweep goes to his spawn point, not one of these rooms.
Dr Reflex's Office
No special properties. Dr Reflex's hammer is at his spawn point.
Library
No sound will play in this room, and if a player is in it their game is muted.
Outside
The player can run infinitely in this room, and all rule violations will be forgotten!
Cafeteria
Bananas are literred across the floor in this room.
Standard Door
It's textures automatically adapt to the room its placed in or by.
Swinging Door
This door can be walked and seen through.
Silent Swinging Door
Use instead of the regular swinging door for library entrances. Or don't. Or use it elsewhere.
Coin Door
A yellow door that requires a quarter to unlock.
Oneway Door
This door can only be entered from the direction you assign it.
Oneway Door
Wooden Window
Although not a door at first glance, this 'door' can be opened by First-Prize slamming into it!
Fluorescent Light
An all time classic since 1999!
Caged Light
Scary... Does not come with the yellow tint. You must do that yourself.
Corded Hanging Light
Most ceilings cannot handle the vast power of this light...
Hanging Light
Snazzy!
Elevator
An elevator that can be used to exit the level.
Entrance Elevator
If placed, the player will spawn here instead of the spawn point.
Can be used in a variety of different structures, such as BSODA machines.
Pushes away entities. Lasts 3 seconds.
Pushes away entities. Lasts 30 seconds.
Restores player stamina to 200%
Can be placed on the floor to make NPCs slip and slide across the ground.
Can cut things such as Playtime's rope, gum, or First-Prize's wires.
Makes the player more resistant to outside forces such as conveyor belts or wind.
Makes a 5 tile area around the player silent for 5 minutes.
Can open any locked door.
When put in a tape player, Baldi forgets what he is doing and is unable to hear for 30 seconds.
Makes a high priority sound after a configurable (by the player) amount of time.
Can lock a yellow door for 30 seconds.
Speedily sends the Principal to the player's current location.
Creates a cloud of chalk that NPCs can't see the player through for 60 seconds.
NPCs (excluding Baldi) will not interact with the player for 30 seconds.
The player will be invisible for 30 seconds.
The player will be able to reach any interactable regardless of distance or height for 1 minute.
Will teleport the player to a random spot on the map.
Can be placed on a non-blocked wall to create passage through.
Will attach to whatever solid surface the Player is looking at and pull them rapidly towards it.
Baldi will eat this Apple for 30 seconds instead of giving the player a game over.
Required to go on a field trip.
25 YTPs
Awards 25 YTPs upon collection.
50 YTPs
Awards 50 YTPs upon collection.
100 YTPs
Awards 100 YTPs upon collection.
Used to open Triangle Shape Locks.
Used to open Square Shape Locks.
Used to open Circle Shape Locks.
Used to open Star Shape Locks.
Used to open Heart Shape Locks.
Used to open Weird Shape Locks.
Student Desk
Every good, functioning, limb owning student needs one of these!
Big Desk
Notebooks are usually placed on these, but don't have to be!
Chair
A chair is a piece of furniture with a raised surface supported by legs, commonly used to seat a single person.
Diet BSODA Machine
Gives you a Diet BSODA when you put a quarter in! How are you supposed to rot your teeth out?
BSODA Machine
Gives you a BSODA when you put a quarter in! Tasty blue.
Zesty Bar Machine
Gives you a Zesty Bar when you put a quarter in! *CRUNCH*
Crazy Machine (Zesty)
Get a CRaAaAZY Item when you put a quarter into this machine!
Crazy Machine (BSODA)
Get a CRaAaAZY Item when you put a quarter into this machine!
Notebook
You need to collect these to complete your level!
Math Machine
Solve math, get book. What more is there to say?
Corner Math Machine
Solve corner math? Get corner book? Listen it's just the math machine rotated 45 degrees.
